profile.content: Theja Ashwin is a Computer Science graduate from Mahendra Institute of Technology (2021-2025). He is an Indian citizen based in India with email thejaashwin62@gmail.com and phone 9360067452. His portfolio is available at https://thejaashwin.me. He is a full stack developer with expertise in React, Node.js, and cloud technologies, passionate about innovation and problem-solving.
profile.summary: Theja Ashwin, CS graduate, full-stack developer with React, Node.js, and cloud expertise.

content: Bachelor of Engineering (BE) in Computer Science from Mahendra Institute of Technology (2021-2025)
Board of Higher Education from St. John's Matriculation Higher Secondary School (2020-2021)
education_background.summary: BE in Computer Science, completed schooling at St. John's Matriculation HSS.

responsibilities: Built a teacher-student appointment scheduling app using React, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB
Developed mobile apps using Android Studio, Flutter, and Dart Language

work_experience.summary: Interned at Neuron.ai and Imagecon Academy, working on web and mobile development.

content: Tools: Git, GitHub, Postman, Docker, AWS (EB, RDS, ECS), Netlify, Render, Vercel, VS Code
Currently learning: AI/ML - RAG, Microservices, Kubernetes
technical_skills.summary: Full stack developer with frontend, backend, databases, tools, and cloud skills.
